data.text: @TomPetrucciTK @cvspharmacy Boohooo you priviliged asshole, get over it

@cvspharmacy Hey asshole,howa bout you hire security guards to protect your employees,i can ask the 4 guys in ski masks filling up garbage bags with your product if they need help all day, pretty sure the answers always gonna be no. Then you have the nerve to cut our hours, your a joke.
@cvspharmacy 2/2:  ...(loading docks bordering residential areas shouldn't be allowed in the first place), now your employees have to annoy the neighborhood with their loud MUSIC as well.

@cvspharmacy 1/2: Pretty sad that I have to write these lines to you, a company that's actually supposed to be considerate of other people's health: It's apparently not enough to bother the whole neighborhood with extremely loud loading / unloading noises and back-up beepers...

@cvspharmacy What about boosters? Why, after my rheumatologist told me to get my second booster and your own website cleared me to receive it, would your pharmacist not administer it?! I’ve been asking for weeks, and your silence tells me that you don’t believe #MyDisabledLifeIsWorthy.

@cvspharmacy Can you all add some extra security to ExtraCare rewards? Walgreens makes you enter the phone# AND the zip code. Why can't CVS do that so randos can't enter all of their old #'s and use everyone else's benefits?
